settings.levelText: Enter the text to be displayed for the levels (e.g. Rank, Level)
settings.expText: Enter the text to be displayed for the exp（e.g.「[expTotal] Exp」）
settings.expForPost: The exp gained for each post
settings.expForPostDesc: Pure number, no decimal. Or range, e.g.「[1, 10]」means a random number between 1 and 10
settings.postMinLength: The minimum length of a post, 0 means no limit
settings.postMaxTimes: The maximum number of posts that can be made per day, 0 means no limit
settings.expForDiscussion: The exp gained for each discussion
settings.expForDiscussionDesc: Pure number, no decimal. Or range, e.g.「[1, 10]」means a random number between 1 and 10
settings.discussionMaxTimes: The maximum number of discussions that can be made per day, 0 means no limit
settings.expForLike: The exp gained when being liked
settings.expForLikeDesc: Requires flarum/likes extension. Pure number, no decimal. Or range, e.g.「[1, 10]」means a random number between 1 and 10
settings.cascadeRemove: When a discussion is removed, remove the exp of the replies

auto_remove: When a post/reply is hidden or deleted (default)
When a post/reply is permanently deleted

type.comment_deleted_in_deleted_discussion: Comment was deleted in deleted discussion

error.calculation: The calculation of exp level is wrong.
